name: i18next-multiload-backend-adapter
description: enables multiload behaviour of wrapped backend

scripts.compile:esm: rm -rf esm && mkdir esm && BABEL_ENV=esm babel lib -d esm
scripts.compile:cjs: rm -rf cjs && mkdir cjs && BABEL_ENV=cjs babel lib -d cjs
scripts.compile: npm run compile:esm && npm run compile:cjs
scripts.browser: browserify --standalone i18nextMultiloadBackendAdapter cjs/index.js -o i18nextMultiloadBackendAdapter.js && uglifyjs i18nextMultiloadBackendAdapter.js --compress --mangle -o i18nextMultiloadBackendAdapter.min.js
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run browser
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && mocha test -R spec --exit --experimental-modules && npm run test:typescript
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run build && git push
